item.title: Wright choice: Former Roo appointed Pies' AFLW coach
item.description: The Magpies have appointed former Roo Sam Wright as their AFLW coach

item.title: Site chosen for Tasmanian team's training base
item.description: Parklands on Hobart's eastern shore have been chosen as the site of a $70 million high-performance training centre for the Tasmanian AFL club

item.title: Ex-Bomber among trio extending Dockers trial into new year
item.description: The Dockers have decided a trio will continue their trials with the club into next year

item.title: Modern greats join AFL as part of footy ops reshuffle
item.description: Joel Selwood and Erin Phillips will take on new roles at the AFL

item.title: AFL and SANFL extend live streaming partnership
item.description: All Hostplus SANFL League matches will be shown live and free on AFL.com.au and the AFL Live Official App, powered by Telstra, in season 2024

item.title: Saints open talks with young gun after exciting debut year
item.description: Mattaes Phillipou is expected to ink a new deal with St Kilda partway through 2024
